# DtoInfo&lt;T&gt;.ShallowClone method

Clones the specified DTO by copying each property into a new instance.

```csharp
public T ShallowClone(T value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | The instance to clone. |

## Remarks

The DTO must have a public default constructor, and all properties must be read/write.
